description: The Socialist leader took risks and battled his way to power - but governing is still a bumpy ride.
title: Pedro S¨¢nchez: The rise of Spain's battle-scarred PM
title_page: Pedro S¨¢nchez: The rise of Spain's battle-scarred PM - BBC News
maintext: "He has used his time in government to project an image of gravity and of being someone who is suited to the post of prime minister," says Josep Lobera, a sociologist at Madrid's Autonomous University (UAM) ¨C who adds that being in government has boosted Mr S¨¢nchez's standing among leftist voters.
